item.title: 据 ABC 新闻报道，白宫将联邦调查局高级职员的背景调查移交给五角大楼
item.description: 美国广播公司（ABC）周四援引知情人士的话报道称，白宫已指示联邦调查局停止对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的数十名高级幕僚进行背景调查，并将这一程序移交给五角大楼。【原文：The White House has directed the FBI to stop conducting background checks into dozens of U.S. President Donald Trump's top staffers, and to transfer the process to the Pentagon, ABC News reported Thursday, citing sources familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 五角大楼泄密者杰克-特谢拉承认犯有妨碍军事行动罪
item.description: 杰克-特谢拉（Jack Teixeira）是马萨诸塞州空军国民警卫队的一名成员，因在网上泄露美国国家安全机密文件而被判 15 年监禁。【原文：Jack Teixeira, a member of the Massachusetts Air National Guard who is serving a 15-year prison sentence for leaking classified U.S. national security documents online, on Thursday pleaded guilty to military charges of obstructing justice.】

item.title: 五角大楼泄密者杰克-特谢拉承认犯有妨碍军事行动罪
item.description: 杰克-特谢拉（Jack Teixeira）是马萨诸塞州空军国民警卫队的一名成员，因在网上泄露美国国家安全机密文件而被判 15 年监禁。【原文：Jack Teixeira, a member of the Massachusetts Air National Guard who is serving a 15-year prison sentence for leaking classified U.S. national security documents online, on Thursday pleaded guilty to military charges of obstructing justice.】

item.title: 卢特尼克称特朗普希望在预算平衡时免除收入低于 15 万美元者的税收--福克斯新闻
item.description: 美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）周四告诉福克斯新闻（Fox News），美国总统唐纳德-特朗普希望在平衡预算后免除收入低于15万美元的美国人的税收。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump would like to waive taxes for Americans earning under $150,000 once he balances the budget, Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick told Fox News on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国批准扩建蒙大拿州煤矿
item.description: 内政部周四在一份声明中说，特朗普政府批准了一项扩建蒙大拿州煤矿并将其寿命延长16年的计划。【原文：The Trump administration approved a plan to expand a Montana coal mine and extend its life by 16 years, the Interior Department said in a statement on Thursday.】

item.title: 食品与药物管理局警告说，周一返回办公室时将出现争抢工作和停车位的情况
item.description: 美国食品和药物管理局（U.S. Food and Drug Administration）本周告诉员工，该局无法保证他们在周一按要求集体返回办公室时将面临的工作空间或停车位等障碍，这引发了对该机构进一步混乱的担忧。【原文：The U.S. Food and Drug Administration told staff this week it cannot guarantee work space or parking spots among the hurdles they will face on Monday when they return to their offices en mass as required, raising concerns of further disruption at the agency.】

item.title: 白宫撤回疫苗批评家韦尔登的疾控中心主任候选人提名
item.description: 白宫撤回了唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统对前共和党国会议员、疫苗问题批评家戴夫-韦尔登（Dave Weldon）担任美国疾病控制和预防中心主任的提名，这一举动出人意料地发生在他原定于周四举行的参议院确认听证会前不久。【原文：The White House withdrew President Donald Trump's nomination of former Republican congressman and vaccine critic Dave Weldon to serve as director of the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, a surprise move that came shortly before his scheduled Senate confirmation hearing on Thursday.】

item.title: 特朗普要求美国最高法院干预遏制出生公民权的努力
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周四将他试图限制美国与生俱来的公民权的斗争推向了最高法院，这位共和党总统的政府要求大法官们缩小对他强硬移民政策中这一关键因素的司法阻挠。【原文：Donald Trump took the fight over his attempt to restrict automatic U.S. birthright citizenship to the Supreme Court on Thursday as the Republican president's administration asked the justices to narrow a judicial block imposed on this key element of his hardline approach toward immigration.】

item.title: 在特朗普政府做出保证后，工会撤回阻止美国国际开发署（USAID）粉碎文件的动议
item.description: 在得到特朗普政府律师关于没有人事档案被销毁的保证后，政府工作人员工会周四放弃了阻止美国国际开发署粉碎该机构现已关闭的办公室内文件的动议。【原文：Government worker unions on Thursday dropped their motion to block the U.S. Agency for International Development from shredding documents in the agency's now-shuttered offices after being assured by Trump administration lawyers that no personnel records had been destroyed.】

item.title: 特朗普政府因终止运输安全管理局官员的工会谈判而被起诉
item.description: 工会周四提起诉讼，要求阻止特朗普政府终止为美国机场和其他交通枢纽检查站的约 5 万名运输安全管理局官员进行集体谈判。【原文：Unions filed a lawsuit on Thursday seeking to block the Trump administration from ending collective bargaining for about 50,000 Transportation Security Administration officers that staff checkpoints at U.S. airports and other transportation hubs.】

item.title: 参议院批准 Pulte 担任房利美和房地美监管机构职务
item.description: 美国参议院周四投票确认威廉-普尔特（William Pulte）担任负责监管房利美和房地美的监管机构的下一任主管。【原文：The U.S. Senate voted Thursday to confirm William Pulte to serve as the next director of the regulator charged with overseeing housing giants Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚大学学生被捕后，抗议者占领特朗普大厦
item.description: 周四，数十人涌入纽约市特朗普大厦大厅，抗议逮捕和拘留哥伦比亚大学学生马哈茂德-哈利勒（Mahmoud Khalil）。【原文：Scores of people poured into the lobby of Trump Tower in New York City on Thursday to protest the arrest and detention of Columbia University student Mahmoud Khalil, whom the Trump administration aims to deport over his pro-Palestinian activism.】

item.title: 电子邮件称白宫指示各机构避免解雇网络安全人员
item.description: 据路透社看到的一封电子邮件称，白宫正在敦促联邦机构不要裁减其网络安全团队，因为他们正在争分夺秒地遵守周四提交大规模裁员计划以削减预算的最后期限。【原文：The White House is urging federal agencies to refrain from laying off their cybersecurity teams, as they scramble to comply with a Thursday deadline to submit mass layoff plans to slash their budgets, according to an email seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 美国邮政与埃隆-马斯克的 DOGE 团队签署援助协议
item.description: 美国邮政总局局长路易斯-德乔伊（Louis DeJoy）告诉国会，他与埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 DOGE 政府改革团队签署了一项协议，在这个亏损的机构努力解决 "大问题 "的过程中，为其提供援助。【原文：U.S. Postmaster General Louis DeJoy told Congress he signed an agreement with Elon Musk's DOGE government reform team to provide assistance to the money-losing agency as it works to address "big problems."】

item.title: 特朗普称纽约州州长霍邱尔将于周五与特朗普会晤
item.description: 特朗普周四告诉记者，纽约州州长凯西-霍楚尔（Kathy Hochul）将于周五上午来华盛顿与唐纳德-特朗普总统会面。【原文：New York Governor Kathy Hochul will come to Washington to meet with President Donald Trump on Friday morning, Trump told reporters on Thursday.】

item.title: 参议院备忘录显示，特朗普医疗保险提名人近年来可能 "严重 "少缴医疗保险税款
item.description: 根据参议院财政委员会民主党工作人员起草的一份备忘录，被唐纳德-特朗普总统提名监督医疗保险和医疗补助计划的名医麦赫麦特-奥兹博士近年来似乎少缴了社会保险和医疗保险税。【原文：Dr. Mehmet Oz, the celebrity physician nominated by President Donald Trump to oversee Medicare and Medicaid, appears to have underpaid his social security and Medicare taxes in recent years, according to a memo drafted by Democratic staffers on the Senate Finance Committee.】

item.title: 美国农民起诉特朗普政府扣留 IRA 资金
item.description: 周四，几位美国农民和非营利组织对特朗普政府提起诉讼，称其非法扣留农业部通过《通货膨胀削减法》（Inflation Reduction Act）资助的拨款。【原文：Several U.S. farmers and nonprofits filed a lawsuit against the Trump administration on Thursday, arguing it is illegally withholding Department of Agriculture grants funded by the Inflation Reduction Act.】

item.title: 美国法官命令特朗普政府恢复数千名被解雇工人的工作
item.description: 加利福尼亚州的一名联邦法官周四命令六家美国机构恢复数千名新近被解雇的员工的工作，这些员工是唐纳德-特朗普总统清理联邦员工队伍行动的一部分。【原文：A California federal judge on Thursday ordered six U.S. agencies to reinstate thousands of recently-hired employees who were fired as part of President Donald Trump's purge of the federal workforce.】

item.title: 美国参议员敦促农业部恢复被取消的地方食品计划
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一封信的副本，美国参议院的民主党人将要求农业部撤销已向学校和食品银行采购了 20 多亿美元当地食品的项目。【原文：Democrats in the U.S. Senate will ask the Department of Agriculture to reverse the cancellation of programs that have funneled more than $2 billion for local food purchases to schools and food banks, according to a copy of a letter seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 美国许多鸟类物种被认为已达到数量 "临界点
item.description: 据一份新的报告称，由于栖息地丧失和气候变化等因素，美国鸟类数量正在经历惊人的下降，该报告确定了 112 个已达到 "临界点 "的物种，其中包括 42 个数量极低并呈急剧下降趋势的物种。【原文：U.S. bird populations are experiencing alarming declines due to factors such as habitat loss and climate change, according to a new report identifying 112 species that have reached a "tipping point," including 42 with perilously low numbers and steep downward trends.】

item.title: 美国许多鸟类物种被认为已达到数量 "临界点
item.description: 据一份新的报告称，由于栖息地丧失和气候变化等因素，美国鸟类数量正在经历惊人的下降，该报告确定了 112 个已达到 "临界点 "的物种，其中包括 42 个数量极低并呈急剧下降趋势的物种。【原文：U.S. bird populations are experiencing alarming declines due to factors such as habitat loss and climate change, according to a new report identifying 112 species that have reached a "tipping point," including 42 with perilously low numbers and steep downward trends.】

item.title: 美国众议院小组对喷气式直升机相撞事故展开调查
item.description: 美国众议院监督小组委员会周四表示，它正在调查 1 月份一架陆军黑鹰直升机与一架美国航空公司支线喷气式飞机在华盛顿里根国家机场附近相撞造成 67 人死亡的事件。【原文：A U.S. House of Representatives oversight subcommittee said Thursday it is investigating the collision in January between an Army Black Hawk helicopter and an American Airlines regional jet that killed 67 people near Washington Reagan National Airport.】

item.title: 美国 FDA 首席律师希拉里-珀金斯（Hilary Perkins）上任两天即辞职
item.description: 美国食品和药物管理局首席法律顾问希拉里-珀金斯（Hilary Perkins）周四在社交媒体平台 X 上发文称，美国食品和药物管理局首席法律顾问希拉里-珀金斯（Hilary Perkins）已经辞职，这距离她的任命宣布仅过去了两天。【原文：The U.S. Food and Drug Administration's chief counsel, Hilary Perkins, has resigned, the federal agency said in a post on social media platform X on Thursday, just two days after her appointment was announced.】

item.title: 特朗普政府试图驳回哥伦比亚大学学生对逮捕的质疑
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统的政府敦促法官驳回哥伦比亚大学学生马哈茂德-哈利勒（Mahmoud Khalil）对其移民逮捕提出的质疑，或者将此案移出纽约，因为这位亲巴勒斯坦活动人士的律师正在为他的获释而斗争。【原文：President Donald Trump's administration has urged a judge to dismiss Columbia University student Mahmoud Khalil's challenge to his immigration arrest, or alternatively move the case out of New York, as the pro-Palestinian activist's lawyers fight for his release.】

item.title: 布蒂吉格表示不会竞选密歇根州州长和美国参议员
item.description: 美国前交通部长皮特-巴蒂吉格（Pete Buttigieg）周四表示，他将不会竞选明年的密歇根州州长或美国参议院参议员。【原文：Former U.S. Transportation Secretary Pete Buttigieg said on Thursday that he will not run for governor in Michigan or U.S. Senate next year.】

item.title: 布蒂吉格表示不会竞选密歇根州州长和美国参议员
item.description: 美国前交通部长皮特-巴蒂吉格（Pete Buttigieg）周四表示，他将不会竞选明年的密歇根州州长或美国参议院参议员。【原文：Former U.S. Transportation Secretary Pete Buttigieg said on Thursday that he will not run for governor in Michigan or U.S. Senate next year.】

item.title: 美国法官命令 DOGE 和马斯克提供削减成本的记录
item.description: 一名法官命令埃隆-马斯克和他的政府效率部回答有关他们削减联邦开支的问题。【原文：A judge has ordered Elon Musk and his Department of Government Efficiency to answer questions describing their efforts to slash federal spending.】

item.title: 民主党领导的各州起诉阻止特朗普解散美国教育部
item.description: 一群民主党州检察长周四提起诉讼，寻求阻止共和党美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的政府解散美国教育部，并阻止其裁员近一半。【原文：A group of Democratic state attorneys general on Thursday filed a lawsuit seeking to block Republican U.S. President Donald Trump's administration from dismantling the U.S. Department of Education and halt it from laying off nearly half of its staff.】

item.title: 据 Axios 报道，白宫撤回特朗普的疾控中心人选
item.description: 据 Axios 周四报道，白宫正在撤换唐纳德-特朗普总统提名的美国疾病控制和预防中心领导人戴夫-韦尔登（Dave Weldon），就在提名人即将在美国参议院接受确认之际。【原文：The White House is pulling President Donald Trump's nominee to lead the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, Dave Weldon, Axios reported on Thursday just as the nominee was set to appear before the U.S. Senate for confirmation.】

item.title: 美国每周申请失业救济人数下降，劳动力市场保持稳定
item.description: 上周新申请失业救济的美国人数有所下降，但政府大幅削减开支和贸易战升级威胁着劳动力市场的稳定。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for unemployment benefits fell last week, but sharp government spending cuts and an escalating trade war threaten labor market stability.】
